title: Prompt-to-Production: The Professional’s No‑Code Power-User Track
outcome: Move from clean basics to medium‑level mastery—design robust prompts, control style and structure, and ship reliable outputs in daily work.
core_techniques: ROLE–TASK–CONSTRAINT–EXAMPLE (RTCE) prompt framework; context packaging with delimiters and variables; iterative prompting; self‑review loops; structured output patterns (JSON schemas, tables); response benchmarking and A/B testing.
chatgpt_tools_features: Custom Instructions and Memory; Advanced Data Analysis (for batch prompting, scoring, and templating); Browsing (for citations and verification); file uploads (docs, PDFs, CSVs); Regenerate/Compare; shared links; prompt templates.
context_optimization: chunking and window budgeting; rolling summaries; few‑shot exemplars vs. instruction bias; persona anchoring via Custom Instructions.
deliverables: a reusable prompt library with templates for briefs, emails, reports; a “quality checklist” rubric; a structured-output schema pack for consistent handoffs to colleagues.

title: Build Your Departmental Co‑Pilot: Custom GPTs, Knowledge, and Actions (No Code)
outcome: Design specialized assistants for your team (e.g., legal clause reviewer, sales brief generator, research digester) using the GPT Builder—no coding required.
chatgpt_tools_features: Custom GPTs; Knowledge files (private corpora, playbooks, PDFs); conversation starters; output style presets; role scoping; GPT Store publishing (private or org); versioning; access controls.
medium_level_features: Actions (no‑code API connections using provided OpenAPI specs from IT); schema‑guided outputs; response guards; test conversations; usage analytics cues.
frameworks: Assistant Canvas (Purpose → Inputs → Knowledge → Tools → Constraints → Output Schema → QA checks); governance checklists; evaluation sets for acceptance criteria.
deliverables: two production‑ready Custom GPTs per learner (with knowledge packs, output schemas, and QA prompts) plus a governance one‑pager for stakeholders.

title: Data‑to‑Decision: Analysis, Visualization, and Reporting with Advanced Data Analysis
outcome: Turn spreadsheets, CSVs, and PDFs into insights and executive‑ready narratives without writing code.
chatgpt_tools_features: Advanced Data Analysis (for data cleaning, joins, pivots, visualizations, regression/segmentation); file uploads (multi‑file); document parsing; Browsing for contextual enrichment and citations.
techniques: question-to-analysis scaffolds; insight trees; confidence and caveat prompts; executive summary distillation; reproducible “analysis playbooks” with saved instructions and input templates.
medium_level_features: batch runs over multiple files; chart spec prompting; structured outputs to CSV/JSON; table-to-slide outlines; automated appendix generation.
deliverables: a reusable analysis notebook per learner, a chart style guide prompt, and a one‑click report template that converts findings into briefings.

title: Multimodal Mastery: Vision, Voice, and Document Automation for Professionals
outcome: Use images, diagrams, scanned docs, and voice to accelerate reviews, audits, and content creation.
chatgpt_tools_features: Vision (image understanding, diagram reading, table extraction); PDF/Doc uploads; voice mode (dictation, read‑back); image generation for mockups or illustrations.
techniques: layout-aware extraction prompts; table reconstruction; slide/storyboard generation; voice‑driven drafting; multimodal QA checklists; promptable OCR cleanup and formatting.
medium_level_features: image‑to‑spec summaries; design critique rubrics; document redlining suggestions; style transfer with few‑shot examples; structured outputs (markdown/JSON) for downstream tools.
deliverables: a document‑to‑slide pipeline template, an image/diagram analysis playbook, and a voice‑enabled review workflow.

title: Reliable AI at Work: Verification, Safety, and Compliance Playbook
outcome: Make ChatGPT outputs trustable, traceable, and compliant in professional settings.
chatgpt_tools_features: Browsing for source‑backed answers; Advanced Data Analysis for batch evaluation and rubric scoring; Memory for stable preferences; Custom Instructions for guardrails; shared links for audits.
techniques: verification chains (research → synthesis → citation check → risk note); hallucination mitigation (retrieve/quote/compare); self‑critique prompts; red‑team prompts; PII sanitization patterns; sensitive data handling.
medium_level_features: evaluation sets (test inputs and golden answers) to measure quality; schema‑locked outputs for audit; prompt fallbacks and “escalate-to-human” triggers.
deliverables: a compliance prompt kit, evaluation scorecards with thresholds, and a documented assurance workflow integrated into day‑to‑day tasks.
